Backfire

  1. If the damage done by Backfire is enough to KO the attacker, does the attacker still do attack damage? [Source: WotC]
    No. You reveal Backfire before battle cards are flipped. In fact, if Backfire KOâ€™s the attacker, the attack will end and no one flips battle cards.
